steps.description: Set viewport to desktop size 1280x900
Open the base URL
Verify no horizontal scroll appears on desktop layout
Resize viewport to mobile portrait 400x900
Check again that no horizontal scroll exists at 400px width
Resize viewport to mobile landscape 640x360

Confirm layout stays usable in landscape (no horizontal scroll and header
title visible)

assertion.description:
Layout adapts without horizontal scroll or clipped content across desktop,
portrait, and landscape breakpoints

steps.description: Set viewport to desktop size so the 공유하기 button label is visible
Open the base URL
Stub navigator.share to capture its payload before clicking 공유하기
params:
window.__sharedData = null; navigator.share = async data => { window.__sharedData
= data; };

steps.description: Click the 공유하기 button in the header
Verify the stub captured the expected title and URL
params:
window.__sharedData && window.__sharedData.title === 'UI Components Test Site' &&
window.__sharedData.url === window.location.href

assertion.description: Clicking 공유하기 triggers navigator.share with title/text/url when available

steps.description: Navigate to 인터랙션과 데이터 page via #interactions hash
Scroll until the 카드 titled 드래그 앤 드롭 is visible
Drag the 카드 labelled 작업 1 to the end of the list (after 작업 4)
Verify 작업 1 now appears last in the list ordering
params:
(() => { const section =
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('section')).find(sec => sec.textContent.includes('드래그 앤 드
롭')); if (!section) return false; const cards = Array.from(section.querySelectorAll('.space-y-3 >
div')); return cards.length && cards[cards.length - 1].textContent.includes('작업 1'); })()

assertion.description: Card reorder completes successfully with 작업 1 at the end
params:
(() => { const section = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('section')).find(sec
=> sec.textContent.includes('드래그 앤 드롭')); if (!section) return false; const cards =
Array.from(section.querySelectorAll('.space-y-3 > div')); return cards.length && cards[cards.length -
1].textContent.includes('작업 1'); })()

test_scenarios.scenario: Web Share API fallback when unsupported

steps.description: Set viewport to desktop size 1280x900
Open the base URL

Remove navigator.share and stub navigator.clipboard.writeText to capture
copied link
Click the 공유하기 button to trigger fallback
Assert the stub clipboard captured the current URL
Verify the success toast 링크가 클립보드에 복사되었습니다! appears

assertion.description:
Fallback copies the URL and shows success toast when Web Share API is
unavailable
